room_title: Escape room "Infection" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: We took our nieces here - it was a great way to spend time with them. The Infection room was a perfect introduction for them and their problem-solving skills were definitely up to the task! We finished with 16 minutes to spare! I would highly recommend this!!

room_title: Escape room "Infection" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: Our first time doing this, we loved It! Very addicting, we did Infection with just two of us. Couldn't beat the 60 minutes, but she let us go over and we did it in 64 minutes. Staff was outstanding and so helpful. Can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Infection" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: Our group had so much fun playing this game (and we still came out friends :-)). I would highly recommend this to everyone. We did the Infection Room and we cannot wait to do the Mob and the Prison rooms. This is absolutely a fun way to have a family/friend/group get together.

room_title: Escape room "Infection" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: We did the Infectious room. We loved it. It is very well done. We made it out with time to spare. Would definitely go back to do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Infection" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: My cousins and I booked the infection room and ended up having a blast! We loved it so much we ended up doing the mob room directly after. Would definitely recommend for family's or co workers!
